title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: Early today Binance announced their dual launchpool for projects of sei and cyberconnect. This is unusual to do same project at once. So we see a slight massive pumo for bnb. These are good to farm some new project tokens. Especially if there is an airdrop for both project. Anyone who lucky here join those drops from projects? Links below: https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/introducing-sei-sei-on-binance-launchpool-farm-sei-by-staking-bnb-tusd-and-fdusd-b1d3b4df9cb34f679783a4fdb891f643https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/introducing-cyberconnect-cyber-on-binance-launchpool-farm-cyber-by-staking-bnb-tusd-and-fdusd-7d1f62e7483d406584a754a38094358a

comments.author: Bobrox
comments.body: I don't know what happen with my Binance account after checking step by step for joining Launchpool seems not find right way, I have check menu for joining with kinds of Launchpool but seems not find yet for participating. Here my all menu in Binance account and try with direct link but not find with project Sei and Cyberconnect. I am interested for joining both launchpool exactly with staking BNB than holding because I bought on higher price. Based on your opinion OP, what do you think both project Sei and Cyberconnect launchpool will worth and give the same allocated because last launchpad hold more than 30 BNB earn small reward without deduction fund under 0.01%.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on August 01, 2023, 08:39:20 AMEarly today Binance announced their dual launchpool for projects of sei and cyberconnect. This is unusual to do same project at once. So we see a slight massive pumo for bnb. These are good to farm some new project tokens. Especially if there is an airdrop for both project. Anyone who lucky here join those drops from projects? Links below: https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/introducing-sei-sei-on-binance-launchpool-farm-sei-by-staking-bnb-tusd-and-fdusd-b1d3b4df9cb34f679783a4fdb891f643https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/introducing-cyberconnect-cyber-on-binance-launchpool-farm-cyber-by-staking-bnb-tusd-and-fdusd-7d1f62e7483d406584a754a38094358aI participated in both campaigns. I think Sei will give an airdrop to the testnet users as well. If you are checked their tokenomics, you will see there is a section called foundation. So the airdrop coming from that foundation part. Source : https://twitter.com/Sei_FND/status/1640855848120377344?t=L-U40boJKo3Z6vANPdOy9Q&s=19

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Bobrox on August 01, 2023, 08:50:16 AMI have check menu for joining with kinds of Launchpool but seems not find yet for participating. Here my all menu in Binance account and try with direct link but not find with project Sei and Cyberconnect.Hey mate they arent showing up yet since the time is august 02 just check the timezone which they put it.Quote from: Bobrox on August 01, 2023, 08:50:16 AMBased on your opinion OP, what do you think both project Sei and Cyberconnect launchpool will worth and give the same allocated because last launchpad hold more than 30 BNB earn small reward without deduction fund under 0.01%. Cant really knew the potential value mate since it will be depend on the farmers budget or staking during launchpool. Maybe try to get in early to be able to join and farm earlier.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on August 01, 2023, 12:58:37 PMQuote from: cryptoaddictchie on August 01, 2023, 08:39:20 AMEarly today Binance announced their dual launchpool for projects of sei and cyberconnect. This is unusual to do same project at once. So we see a slight massive pumo for bnb. These are good to farm some new project tokens. Especially if there is an airdrop for both project. Anyone who lucky here join those drops from projects? Links below: https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/introducing-sei-sei-on-binance-launchpool-farm-sei-by-staking-bnb-tusd-and-fdusd-b1d3b4df9cb34f679783a4fdb891f643https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/introducing-cyberconnect-cyber-on-binance-launchpool-farm-cyber-by-staking-bnb-tusd-and-fdusd-7d1f62e7483d406584a754a38094358aI participated in both campaigns. I think Sei will give an airdrop to the testnet users as well. If you are checked their tokenomics, you will see there is a section called foundation. So the airdrop coming from that foundation part. Source : https://twitter.com/Sei_FND/status/1640855848120377344?t=L-U40boJKo3Z6vANPdOy9Q&s=19I wasn't aware of Cyber Connect but they did said about having more seasons. As for Sei, I'm glad about starting to farm them in Blocked.cc and have completed 16 of 18 missions (including Humanode). However, I am not sure if that includes being an officer or ambassador role on Discord though as I only have a Crew role there. Let's just hope that this would finally be worth our time in grinding these Sei missions in Blocked.

comments.author: Kunnu
comments.body: Sei network is in testnet stage from the last year probably the devlopers of Sei network have been satisfied with testnet results so they decided to launch their project on Binance which is obviously smart step although the current market condition is quite dull to launch a project but the platform which Sei team has chosen is absolutely brilliant.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: One thing is for sure, Binance is always ahead on trends even when it comes to this project who likely to have rumored on airdrops. I think this is just the beginning of things when it comes to bull market, we've seen this on 2019-2021 and likely it's happening once again. Quote from: cheezcarls on August 01, 2023, 06:32:35 PMAs for Sei, I'm glad about starting to farm them in Blocked.cc and have completed 16 of 18 missions (including Humanode). However, I am not sure if that includes being an officer or ambassador role on Discord though as I only have a Crew role there. Let's just hope that this would finally be worth our time in grinding these Sei missions in Blocked.I think it's already too late now for this, am I right? Good thing that you started, others haven't had the time to scratch the surface and I think even with that you'll be rewarded on it.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: both are really good project but it's still uncertain whether they gonna give airdrop to the users that have been testing their blockchain.though with cyberconnect its already sure that it will do airdrop and the eligibility criteria is already there.but with sei it could be turning like sui for all I know, suddenly making changes towards their plan but we'll see.regardless though it seems this coin gonna be giving massive profits to whoever successfully obtained some share of the coin overall.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Glad to see that cyberconnect being launched on binance. As far as i know that if cyber connect gonna distribute airdrop very soon to the all of users in the season 1. It has stated on its official tweet QuoteIntroducing Community Rewards: Season 1üëâüèº Season 1 Community Rewards claiming will begin on Aug 15 at 12 PM UTC.üëâüèº A total of 2.4% of the total supply (2,400,000 CYBER) will be available for claiming.üëâüèº Holders of the following NFTs are eligible for claiming rewards üëáüèºhttps://twitter.com/CyberConnectHQ/status/1686275537440804864There are still chances to participate in the season 2. The price from each cyber connect token was around 1.8. That being if millions USD already prepared to be distributed to the all of the people. Im very happy see to see that. Glad i have been holding some cyber profiles with less than 11 characters.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on August 01, 2023, 09:55:50 PMOne thing is for sure, Binance is always ahead on trends even when it comes to this project who likely to have rumored on airdrops. I think this is just the beginning of things when it comes to bull market, we've seen this on 2019-2021 and likely it's happening once again. Quote from: cheezcarls on August 01, 2023, 06:32:35 PMAs for Sei, I'm glad about starting to farm them in Blocked.cc and have completed 16 of 18 missions (including Humanode). However, I am not sure if that includes being an officer or ambassador role on Discord though as I only have a Crew role there. Let's just hope that this would finally be worth our time in grinding these Sei missions in Blocked.I think it's already too late now for this, am I right? Good thing that you started, others haven't had the time to scratch the surface and I think even with that you'll be rewarded on it.Unfortunately the Sei missions in Blocked.cc have ended last June. But I think you can still use the Sei bridge to at least interact and hoping that you would get a portion of their airdrop. As it is still under the testnet, you can bridge from Polygon Mumbai testnet to Sei testnet. Why I believe that they‚Äôre going to have an airdrop? It‚Äôs because of the Sei foundation official Twitter (X) account‚Äôs statement here:https://twitter.com/sei_fnd/status/1640855848120377344?s=61&t=6PFitUK4YQvupu3PxlJoIgAlso search on Twitter (X) about Sei related projects who are offering NFT minting activities that would serve as interacting in the Sei testnet. I think Space ID is having a testnet Sei mint event that is ongoing so you may not want to miss it. Just search it.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Sei also got a teaser tweet along with atom/fosmos stakers last year so there are many criteria where those airdropa will be. But probably testers are one of it. Im staking atom so Im hoping they'll beg giving some nice rewards also for cosmos ecosystem.But now its a wild farming happening on binance. Feel free to stake your bnb and earn free sei tokens.I suggest that use binance earn vault to both farm cyber and sei tokens. But if you want to focus on one token then use the launchpool section.

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: SEI and Cyberconnect are doing pretty well, I followed the SEI project from the start of the testnet to the present and held a Launcpool on Binance.Binance really chooses what projects are good according to the Binance team so they can be included in the new launchpool list. Of course, we hope that there will be incentives or privileges for early SEI users.Might be in the SEI launchpool with some of the BNB I have. hope it can be a good project and experience a drastic increase.

However, I am not sure if that includes being an officer or ambassador role on Discord though as I only have a Crew role there. But I think you can still use the Sei bridge to at least interact and hoping that you would get a portion of their airdrop. As it is still under the testnet, you can bridge from Polygon Mumbai testnet to Sei testnet. Why I believe that they‚Äôre going to have an airdrop? It‚Äôs because of the Sei foundation official Twitter (X) account‚Äôs statement here:https://twitter.com/sei_fnd/status/1640855848120377344?s=61&t=6PFitUK4YQvupu3PxlJoIgAlso search on Twitter (X) about Sei related projects who are offering NFT minting activities that would serve as interacting in the Sei testnet. I think Space ID is having a testnet Sei mint event that is ongoing so you may not want to miss it. Just search it.Thanks for that mate, that's really helpful. Well, I think I may give it a try, how much was your budget on Sei missions? I guess that still using transaction fees as part of the ongoing testnet and just hope it wouldn't have to hurt like the fee on ETH network. I'll wait for your response or maybe your strategy for being early on airdrops.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Anyone farming already whats your expectation. Its hard to farm a lot. Like my cyber pool isnt moving and its really far from mining at least 1 cyber. Considering the launch price that could do x5 to x10 with the initial token salw of $1.8 each tokens. Possibly if you can farm like 10 to 20 tokens already good profit. So those who will received airdrop are totally lucky since its quite hard to gain a lot on launchpool.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: It looks like the time has finally come! The Sei airdrop is finally confirmed for testnet participants!https://twitter.com/sei_fnd/status/1689722756521205760?s=61&t=6PFitUK4YQvupu3PxlJoIgThe mainnet was scheduled to launch on August 15. 3 big CEXs already confirmed listing the token which are Binance, Bybit and KuCoin. I bet that MEXC would be next.I am speculating that those who have participated in the Atlantic-1 and Atlantic-2 testnet events are eligible for the much-anticipated airdrop as well as those who participated in the incentivized testnet that are more on the developer side. I‚Äôve only participated in the Atlantic-2 but was too late in minting the Sunken Treasure NFT. However, I did grind in Edge Blocked missions and Sei Bridge event. If I only knew Sei back then, I could have maximized Atlantic-1 and may get even bigger rewards. Many Twitter (X) influencers are already speculating about the criteria and the estimated rewards that we get as early testnet participants. As for me I do not expect much rewards. Maybe 4 figures would do, but at least 3 figures in USD I‚Äôll still take it.As long I have participated and interacted before the snapshot, I‚Äôm fine with that and it‚Äôs free money anyways.
